    SystemListHelper - helper class with some list display functions

    • Method Detail

      • setSystemStatusDisplay

        public static void setSystemStatusDisplay(User user,
                                          SystemOverview next)
        Sets up the HTML tags (image and link) by computing the status from the SystemOverview DTO. This method chains to setSystemStatusDisplay(User, SystemOverview, boolean) and defaults to display links.
        Parameters:
        user - used in entitlement calculation
        next - row used to populate the HTML tags

      • setSystemStatusDisplay

        public static void setSystemStatusDisplay(User user,
                                          SystemOverview next,
                                          boolean makeLinks)
        Sets up the HTML tags (image and potentially link) by computing the status from the SystemOverview DTO.
        Parameters:
        user - used to calc some entitlement info
        next - row used to populate html tags
        makeLinks - indicates if the icons should be rendered as links to other pages

      • setSystemStatusDisplay

        public static void setSystemStatusDisplay(User user,
                                          SystemCurrency next,
                                          boolean makeLinks)
        Sets up the HTML tags (image and potentially link) by computing the status from the SystemCurrency DTO.
        Parameters:
        user - used to calc some entitlement info
        next - row used to populate html tags
        makeLinks - indicates if the icons should be rendered as links to other pages
